From: Lucile Hardin, To: Bess Chandler Mailed From: Springfield, Illinois on OCtober 8, 1911 Postcard Info: No. 1817. V.O. Hammon Pub. Co., Chicago Picture Info: Lincoln Monument, Springfield, Ill.

Miss Bess Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Received your letter and will answer soon. I'm attending state fair today. Lucile
